text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires clarification of occupancy/vacancy risks, specifically mentioning tenants and rights of first refusal. The candidate answer focuses heavily on legal/financial due diligence (title, liens, permits, taxes) related to the property itself and the contract process (*compromesso*). It does not explicitly mention or clarify risks associated with existing tenants (e.g., *locazione* agreements) or the *diritto di prelazione* (right of first refusal) which are critical occupancy/vacancy risks in Italian property sales.", "criterion_id": "41f7cc48-7d35-45ac-b56a-eb97853b50c0"}
